attributes.title: Alerts Overview [Filebeat Azure]
attributes.visState: {"aggs": [], "type": "metrics", "title": "Alerts Overview [Filebeat Azure]", "params": {"filter": {"query": "event.dataset :\"azure.activitylogs\" and azure.activitylogs.event_category : \"Alert\"", "language": "kuery"}, "time_field": "", "default_index_pattern": "metricbeat-*", "type": "timeseries", "series": [{"split_mode": "filter", "stacked": "none", "chart_type": "line", "id": "61ca57f1-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417", "axis_position": "right", "filter": {"query": "azure.activitylogs.result_type: \"Activated\"", "language": "kuery"}, "fill": 0.5, "hide_in_legend": 0, "color": "rgba(252,220,0,1)", "separate_axis": 0, "point_size": 1, "metrics": [{"type": "count", "id": "61ca57f2-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417"}], "formatter": "number", "line_width": 1}, {"split_mode": "filter", "stacked": "none", "chart_type": "line", "id": "5a52f170-ec1e-11e9-b6a7-21d19b63822a", "axis_position": "right", "filter": {"query": "azure.activitylogs.result_type: \"Resolved\" or azure.activitylogs.result_type: \"Succeeded\"", "language": "kuery"}, "fill": 0.5, "hide_in_legend": 0, "color": "#68BC00", "separate_axis": 0, "point_size": 1, "metrics": [{"type": "count", "id": "5a52f171-ec1e-11e9-b6a7-21d19b63822a"}], "formatter": "number", "line_width": 1}], "interval": "", "isModelInvalid": false, "axis_position": "left", "axis_formatter": "number", "show_grid": 1, "id": "61ca57f0-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417", "index_pattern": "filebeat-*", "show_legend": 0, "default_timefield": "@timestamp", "axis_scale": "normal"}}

attributes.title: Alerts Count [Filebeat Azure]
attributes.visState: {"aggs": [{"enabled": true, "params": {"customLabel": "Alerts"}, "id": "1", "schema": "metric", "type": "count"}, {"enabled": true, "params": {"filters": [{"input": {"query": "azure.activitylogs.result_type : \"Activated\"", "language": "kuery"}, "label": "Activated"}, {"input": {"query": "azure.activitylogs.result_type : \"Resolved\"", "language": "kuery"}, "label": "Resolved"}, {"input": {"query": "azure.activitylogs.result_type : \"Succeeded\"", "language": "kuery"}, "label": "Succeeded"}]}, "id": "2", "schema": "group", "type": "filters"}], "type": "metric", "title": "Alerts Count [Filebeat Azure]", "params": {"addLegend": false, "addTooltip": true, "dimensions": {"bucket": {"type": "vis_dimension", "accessor": 0, "format": {"params": {}, "id": "string"}}, "metrics": [{"type": "vis_dimension", "accessor": 1, "format": {"params": {}, "id": "number"}}]}, "metric": {"invertColors": false, "percentageMode": false, "style": {"bgFill": "#000", "labelColor": false, "bgColor": false, "subText": "", "fontSize": 60}, "colorsRange": [{"from": 0, "to": 10000, "type": "range"}], "useRanges": false, "labels": {"show": true}, "colorSchema": "Green to Red", "metricColorMode": "None"}, "type": "metric"}}
